allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Correct indentation in shell middleware.ts

Fixed syntax error in shell middleware where the cookies object and entire middleware body had incorrect indentation after adding try-catch wrapper. This was causing the middleware to fail to compile, resulting in MIDDLEWARE_INVOCATION_FAILED errors.

Changes:
- Properly indented cookies configuration object
- Properly indented all middleware logic inside try block
- Ensured all braces match correctly

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Add @supabase/ssr dependency to all app package.json files

The MIDDLEWARE_INVOCATION_FAILED error was caused by missing @supabase/ssr dependency in individual app package.json files.

Root cause:
- Middleware imports @supabase/ssr
- Each Next.js app bundles its own middleware  
- Apps couldn''t find @supabase/ssr because it was only in root package.json
- Module resolution failed at runtime causing middleware crash

Fix:
- Added @supabase/ssr@^0.5.2 to dashboard, entities, payments, agency, and shell
- Reports already had it
- Now all apps can successfully import and use the Supabase SSR package

This should resolve the 500 errors on all deployed apps.

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit --allow-empty -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Trigger deployment to apply Supabase environment variables

Updated NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL and NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY 
in Vercel shell project to use UAT Supabase instance.

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(then echo "‚ùå VERCEL_TOKEN is not set")
Bash(for app in dashboard entities payments agency reports)
Bash(for app in dashboard entities payments agency reports shell)
